# CMSampleBuffer.PerSampleAttachmentsDictionary

**Structure**

A structure that defines keys to identify per-sample attachments.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PerSampleAttachmentsDictionary
```

## Specifying Keys

- **CMSampleBuffer.PerSampleAttachmentsDictionary.Key**

## Accessing Elements

- **subscript(_:)**

## Managing Attachments

- **CMSampleBuffer.AttachmentKey**: Keys that identify sample buffer attachments.
- **sampleAttachments**: An array of sample attachments.
- **CMSampleBuffer.SampleAttachmentsArray**

## Conforms To

- Sequence

items.description: Keys that identify sample buffer attachments.
items.name: CMSampleBuffer.AttachmentKey
